# Starlight Breaker - HTML5 Canvas Brick Breaking Game

## Project Overview
This is a modern HTML5 Canvas-based brick breaking game featuring a starlight theme, advanced particle effects, and pure vanilla JavaScript implementation. It showcases comprehensive web game development techniques without external dependencies.

## Core Value Propositions
- **Technical Showcase**: Complete game implementation using only native web technologies
- **Educational Resource**: Comprehensive example of HTML5 Canvas game development best practices
- **Artistic Design**: Unique visual style with custom SVG graphics and particle systems
- **Open Source Contribution**: High-quality codebase under MIT license for learning and contribution

3. Open index.html in any modern browser
4. No build process or dependencies required

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JavaScript ES6+
- **Graphics**: HTML5 Canvas API, SVG
- **Audio**: Web Audio API
- **Storage**: LocalStorage API
- **Design**: Responsive CSS with custom animations
